Iran denies helping Houthis plan attacks on Israel-linked shipsIran denied on Saturday U.S. accusations that it was involved in planning attacks by Yemen's Tehran-aligned Houthi movement on commercial vessels in the Red Sea, the semi-official Mehr news agency reported. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 20:02:44 GMT PYZOXDKJ25NJBGZQB75U5P4RLI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-denies-helping-houthis-plan-attacks-israel-linked-ships-2023-12-23/Reuters世界中东
Argentine president calls for extraordinary sessions of Congress to speed up reformsArgentine President Javier Milei has issued a decree calling for extraordinary sessions to speed up reforms, reinstate the tax on salaries abolished by the previous government, and modernize the electoral process. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 19:50:49 GMT TLUN24AE3RJSHPZ7IZW3QZ3U5Y https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/argentine-president-calls-extraordinary-sessions-congress-speed-up-reforms-2023-12-23/Reuters世界美洲
Kosovo says gunmen from Serbia are planning more attacksKosovo's Prime Minister Albin Kurti said on Saturday that armed men supported by Serbian security agencies were being trained to launch new attacks in his country after a September assault which left four dead. Serbia denied any such plan. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 19:37:13 GMT VXYEWIHCWZPD3HADFQ5Y4ZUCGM https://www.reuters.com/world/kosovo-says-gunmen-serbia-are-planning-more-attacks-2023-12-23/Fatos Bytyci世界
El Salvador court orders arrest of former president for cover-up of massacreA local court in El Salvador has ordered the arrest of former President Alfredo Cristiani for the alleged cover-up of the 1981 El Mozote massacre during the Central American country's civil war that lasted twelve years. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 19:06:48 GMT 3RVLBCRA3RM6PMCQMUT6SB7VFQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/el-salvador-court-orders-arrest-former-president-cover-up-massacre-2023-12-23/Reuters世界美洲
Ukrainian Catholic church rejects Vatican document on same-sex marriagesThe head of Ukraine's eastern-rite Catholic church on Saturday said a document endorsed by Pope Francis this week permitting blessings for same-sex couples did not apply to his church and its teachings. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 18:04:19 GMT EWE6F4K2PZIIPBR22QK7QNGXP4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-catholic-church-says-document-blessing-same-sex-marriage-does-not-2023-12-23/Reuters世界欧洲
Sombre Bethlehem marks Christmas with vigil as bombs rain on GazaPalestinian Christians held a sombre Christmas vigil in Bethlehem on Saturday, with candle-lit hymns and prayers for peace in Gaza instead of the usual festive celebrations at the spot where they believe Jesus Christ was born. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 18:01:30 GMT SHWJWW7ORNMA3BG4NJKJRVAYRQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/sombre-bethlehem-marks-christmas-with-vigil-bombs-rain-gaza-2023-12-23/Reuters世界中东
Gunmen kill at least 20 people in western BurundiGunmen killed at least 20 people and wounded nine others near Burundi's western border with the Democratic Republic of Congo, the government told reporters on Saturday, in an attack claimed by the Red Tabara rebel group. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 16:51:45 GMT U5FJR6KNSVOM5OP4AOYSCHSJGY https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/gunmen-kill-least-20-people-western-burundi-govt-2023-12-23/Reuters世界非洲
Turkey says 12 soldiers killed in clashes with Kurdish militantsTwelve Turkish soldiers have been killed in the past two days in clashes with Kurdistan Workers Party (PKK) militants in northern Iraq, the defence ministry said on Saturday. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 16:27:50 GMT VL2A6YVYXRN75PMM6ND2CVU76E https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-says-12-soldiers-killed-clashes-with-kurdish-militants-2023-12-23/Reuters世界中东
Yemen's warring parties commit to ceasefire steps - U.N. special envoyThe Saudi-backed Yemeni government and Iran-aligned Houthis have both committed to steps towards a ceasefire, the U.N. special envoy for Yemen said on Saturday. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 16:13:31 GMT VYAD7I3FZBMTZKKUSOR5VWUVAM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemens-warring-parties-commit-ceasefire-steps-un-special-envoy-2023-12-23/Mohammed Ghobari世界中东
Unaccompanied minors among Indian passengers on flight grounded in FranceEleven unaccompanied minors were among 303 Indian passengers on a plane grounded in France, a source close to the Paris prosecutor's office said on Saturday, as an investigation into suspected human trafficking continues. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 14:14:21 GMT LAAVYLP3DZOS3CHKJLZNF73LLQ https://www.reuters.com/world/india/french-airport-provides-makeshift-base-indians-grounded-flight-2023-12-23/Reuters世界印度
'Blasphemous' same-sex nativity scene angers conservatives in ItalyA church nativity scene which features two mothers of the Baby Jesus, instead of the conventional Mary and Joseph figurines, has sparked anger among conservative Catholics and politicians in Italy. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 13:09:18 GMT HAETT56Q4RMY7ATBVS7PIHG2YI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/blasphemous-same-sex-nativity-scene-angers-conservatives-italy-2023-12-23/Ciro De Luca世界欧洲
Congo opposition plans protest over disputed electionA group of Congolese opposition candidates have written to the governor of Kinshasa to say they will hold a joint protest next week over the country's disputed general election, as foreign embassies called on all sides to show restraint. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 13:01:17 GMT BKKEVBN62JNOXLGRRCOHSH7LSI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congo-opposition-candidates-plan-presidential-election-protest-2023-12-23/Yassin Kombi, Sonia Rolley世界非洲
Polish farmers to suspend protest at Ukraine border, truckers stay onPolish farmers will suspend a protest at the border crossing with Ukraine at Medyka from Sunday, but truckers will continue blockades at three other crossings over Christmas and will allow even fewer trucks to pass than earlier, they said on Saturday. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 12:50:49 GMT P3LTPFGDARJXNOWRWQA6FJFBUA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-farmers-suspend-protest-ukraine-border-truckers-stay-2023-12-23/Reuters世界欧洲
Bells ring across Czech Republic to mourn victims of mass shootingFlags flew at half staff as people mourned the 14 people who died in the shooting at a Prague university. Yekaterina Duntsova barred from running against Putin in electionFormer TV journalist Yekaterina Duntsova was disqualified on Saturday as a candidate for Russia's next presidential election, preventing her from running against Vladimir Putin on a platform of opposition to the war in Ukraine. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 10:00:46 GMT JW2ROE5LV5IPRB4NMAENHH73UU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/would-be-putin-challenger-duntsova-barred-running-election-campaign-team-2023-12-23/Mark Trevelyan世界欧洲
Iran threatens Mediterranean closure over Gaza, without saying howAn Iranian Revolutionary Guards commander said the Mediterranean Sea could be closed if the United States and its allies continued to commit "crimes" in Gaza, Iranian media reported on Saturday, without explaining how that would happen. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 09:57:47 GMT H2DYAUTYCBOR7GOTDNSUCGSBKM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-threatens-mediterranean-closure-over-gaza-without-saying-how-2023-12-23/Reuters世界中东
India firm denies tampering with tests in probe of cough syrup deathsIndia's Maiden Pharmaceuticals, whose cough syrups have been linked to the deaths of children in Gambia, on Saturday denied it had tampered with test samples or bribed officials to do so, as alleged in a complaint under investigation by local health officials. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 09:51:08 GMT USV4RQW7B5PEFJXC22M42Q2C2A https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-firm-denies-tampering-with-tests-probe-cough-syrup-deaths-2023-12-23/Krishna N. Das世界印度
Taiwan reports more Chinese military activity as election approachesTaiwan reported Chinese warplanes and warships around the island on Saturday, including aircraft crossing the sensitive median line of the Taiwan Strait, as Beijing continues military activities with three weeks to go before Taiwan votes. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 07:30:17 GMT ZRHJG3TN6VPXPNFYGVUXOE34OU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/taiwan-reports-more-chinese-military-activity-election-approaches-2023-12-23/Reuters世界中国
Hamas says lost contact with group responsible for five Israeli hostagesHamas said on Saturday it has lost contact with a group responsible for five Israeli hostages being held captive in the Gaza Strip due to Israeli bombardment. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 21:16:35 GMT OTRXTMT7INKJNOGNI23UZGMVTA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hamas-palestinian-authority-split-un-gaza-resolution-2023-12-22/Reuters世界中东
Fighting rages in northern Gaza; Biden speaks with NetanyahuThick smoke hung over the town of Jabalia, home to Gaza's largest refugee camp, and residents reported persistent aerial bombardment and shelling from Israeli tanks, which they said had moved further into the town. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 01:42:25 GMT P6GEO4SKLZIJHCT5FK4FP4XNYE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-security-council-delays-vote-gaza-aid-until-friday-2023-12-22/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Emily Rose世界中东
